resource.description: Used to install the certificate authority certificate and update the certificate authority status.

properties.name: Certificate
properties.description: Certificate Authority certificate that will be installed in the Certificate Authority.

type.description: Certificate Authority certificate that will be installed in the Certificate Authority.

properties.name: CertificateChain
properties.description: Certificate chain for the Certificate Authority certificate.

type.description: Certificate chain for the Certificate Authority certificate.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the Certificate Authority.

type.description: The status of the Certificate Authority.

attributes.description: Used to install the certificate authority certificate and update the certificate authority status.

properties.name: CompleteCertificateChain
properties.description: The complete certificate chain, including the Certificate Authority certificate.

type.description: The complete certificate chain, including the Certificate Authority certificate.
